---
title: "numero de corridas por hora do dia"
output: html_document
---

```{r}
library(dplyr)

train %>%
  mutate(hpick = hour(pickup_datetime)) %>%
  group_by(hpick, vendor_id) %>%
  count() %>%
  ggplot(aes(hpick, n, color = vendor_id)) +
  geom_point(size = 4) + labs(x = "Hour of the day", y = "Total number of pickups") +  theme(legend.position = "none")
```
